mapper.update: UPDATE diary SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, category = #{category}, tags = #{tags}, mood = #{mood}, weather = #{weather}, related_goal_id = #{relatedGoalId}, image_urls = #{imageUrls}, is_public = #{isPublic}, view_count = #{viewCount}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM diary WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT diary_date) as consecutive_days FROM ( SELECT diary_date, DATE_SUB(diary_date, INTERVAL ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY diary_date) DAY) as grp FROM diary WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY diary_date DESC ) t GROUP BY grp ORDER BY consecutive_days DESC LIMIT 1
